about_the_game:
Friend or Foe is a first person, survival, open world craft game with a story to tell and a world to explore.

Explore the island


You find yourself stranded alone after falling asleep in your boat. The only way home is to explore the vast forest, in search for anything that can tell you where you are, and how you can get home. Along the way, you find yourself facing the animals that inhabits this island.

Choose a path


Every decision counts. Will you be the one who protects the animals or hunt them? Are you the friend or the foe?

Build and Survive


Even though the first priority is to find a way home, there is always a need to find shelther once the evening comes. Cut down trees and gather other resources to build yourself a shelther, or perhaps even a second home.

Mystery


Where did you end up? How will you get home?

Development Team


Friend or Foe is created by a single developer, who is located in Norway. This is also the first game that the developer has ever released.

short_description: Stranded on an island all alone. As you try to find a way home, you come across a peaceful wildlife. Build, explore, befriend the animals or tear it apart and suffer the consequences of your actions.
